SKT_FIRST.name: Shark Attack!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>7%</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 回復強化(回復量)\n弱体効果持続 −2ターン

description: Attacks an enemy and <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000054_1_1]</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>7%</color> 회복시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、残りHPが最も低い味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>7%</color>回復する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Sharks Are Friends
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Restores all allies' <color=#28d9ed>HP</color> by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> and reduces the duration of debuffs by <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>.
description: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000054_2_1]</color> and reduces the duration of debuffs by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>만큼 회복시키고, 약화 효과의 지속 시간을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>回復し、弱体効果の持続時間を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>減少させる。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Wakey-Wakey
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to surviving allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then <color=#28d9ed>Resurrects (Greater)</color> all slain allies. Afterward, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> all allies by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>.
description: Grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to surviving allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000054_3_3] turn(s)</color>, then <color=#28d9ed>Resurrects (Greater)</color> all slain allies. Afterward, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000054_3_2]</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 생존한 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킨 후, 사망한 아군 전체를 <color=#28d9ed>부활(강화)</color>시킵니다. 이후 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>만큼 회복시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 戦場にいる味方の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせた後、倒れた味方全体を<color=#28d9ed>復活(強化)</color>させる。その後、味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>回復させる。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the caster and the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>13%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the caster and the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000054_chain_1_1]</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000054_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군과 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 회복시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>13%</color> 회복시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体と自分の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>回復させる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>13%</color>回復させる。

VoiceActor_jp: CV.氅旊劋 靹膘毎 鞚措
